    • withInheritError

      public Processes.Builder withInheritError()
      Inherit stderr of the current process.

      Cannot be combined with withRedirectError() or withRedirectErrorToOutput().

    • withInheritInput

      public Processes.Builder withInheritInput()
      Inherit stdin of the current process.

      Cannot be combined with withInput().

    • withInheritIO

      public Processes.Builder withInheritIO()
      Inherits stdin, stdout and stderr of the current process.

      Cannot be combined with withInput(), withRedirectOutput(), withRedirectError() or withRedirectErrorToOutput().

    • withInheritOutput

      public Processes.Builder withInheritOutput()
      Inherit stdout of the current process.

      Cannot be combined with withRedirectOutput().

    • withInput

      public Processes.Builder withInput(byte @Nullable [] input)
      Configures stdin content for the process from an input stream.

      Cannot be combined with withInheritInput() which inherits stdin from the current process.

    • withInput

      public Processes.Builder withInput(@Nullable CharSequence input)
      Configures stdin content for the process.

      Cannot be combined with withInheritInput() which inherits stdin from the current process.

    • withInput

      public Processes.Builder withInput(@Nullable File input)
      Configures stdin content for the process.

      Cannot be combined with withInheritInput() which inherits stdin from the current process.

    • withInput

      public Processes.Builder withInput(@Nullable InputStream input)
      Configures stdin content for the process from an input stream.

      Cannot be combined with withInheritInput() which inherits stdin from the current process.

    • withInput

      public Processes.Builder withInput(@Nullable Path input)
      Configures stdin content for the process.

      Cannot be combined with withInheritInput() which inherits stdin from the current process.

    • withRedirectError

      public Processes.Builder withRedirectError(@Nullable Appendable target)
      Redirects stderr to the given Appendable.

      Cannot be combined with withInheritError() or withRedirectErrorToOutput().

    • withRedirectError

      public Processes.Builder withRedirectError(@Nullable Consumer<String> lineConsumer)
      Redirects stderr line by line to the given consumer.

      Cannot be combined with withInheritError() or withRedirectErrorToOutput().

    • withRedirectError

      public Processes.Builder withRedirectError(@Nullable File target)
      Redirects stderr to the given file.

      Cannot be combined with withInheritError() or withRedirectErrorToOutput().

    • withRedirectError

      public Processes.Builder withRedirectError(@Nullable OutputStream target)
      Redirects stderr to the given output stream.

      Cannot be combined with withInheritError() or withRedirectErrorToOutput().

    • withRedirectError

      public Processes.Builder withRedirectError(@Nullable Path target)
      Redirects stderr to the given file.

      Cannot be combined with withInheritError() or withRedirectErrorToOutput().

    • withRedirectError

      public Processes.Builder withRedirectError(@Nullable PrintStream target)
      Redirects stderr to the given print stream.

      Cannot be combined with withInheritError() or withRedirectErrorToOutput().

    • withRedirectErrorToOutput

      public Processes.Builder withRedirectErrorToOutput()
      Redirects stderr to stdout.

      Cannot be combined with withInheritError() or #withRedirectError(...).

    • withRedirectOutput

      public Processes.Builder withRedirectOutput(@Nullable Appendable target)
      Redirects stdout to the given Appendable.

      Cannot be combined with withInheritOutput().

    • withRedirectOutput

      public Processes.Builder withRedirectOutput(@Nullable Consumer<String> lineConsumer)
      Redirects stdout line by line to the given consumer.

      Cannot be combined with withInheritOutput().

    • withRedirectOutput

      public Processes.Builder withRedirectOutput(@Nullable File target)
      Redirects stdout to the given file.

      Cannot be combined with withInheritOutput().

    • withRedirectOutput

      public Processes.Builder withRedirectOutput(@Nullable OutputStream target)

      Cannot be combined with withInheritOutput().
